issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
Description:
While testing ButtonBar I noticed that after buttons "Next" or "Previous" are pressed several times on a ButtonBar, focus of a text field "jumps" over several rows of text fields . 

NOTE: this behavior does not occur on iPad or iPad Simulator

This is not a regression, occurs in 2.1.0

Steps to reproduce:
1. Install the attachment
2. Run TIMOB-6463
3. Press on a first text field
4. Press "Next" several time

Actual result:
The text field focus seems to skip several text fields
Expected result:
the next text field should be focused after button "Next" is pressed
fields.summary: iOS: ButtonBar - text field focus skips several text field's  rows after buttons "Next" or  "Previous" are pressed
fields.environment:
Tested on:
Titanium Studio, build: 2.1.1.201207161421
Titanium SDK: 2.1.1.v20120718121609
iPhone4  4.3.5
iPhone4S 5.0.1
